settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)

effects: 11 creative mode settings (toy camera, retro, sepia, etc.)
ISO: up to 6400 ISO with little noise
long_exposure: up to 30 seconds, with bulb mode expose as long as you want

color: purple, red, silver, pink, or black
preset_modes: more  than 24 exposure modes (e.g. snow, sports, backlighting)
effects: 24 photo effects (miniature, big eyes, soft focus, etc.)
ISO: up to 3200 ISO with little noise
